data.title: Hugh Grant's wife Anna upstages husband with leggy display at Wonka premiere
data.meta_description: Hugh Grant has been busy promoting his latest Hollywood movie, Wonka, and his wife, Anna Elisabet Eberstein has supported him throughout.
data.text:
Hugh Grant, 63, looked rather dapper as he attended the LA premiere of Wonka alongside his stunning wife Anna Elisabet Eberstein, 40.

The Hollywood actor looked stylish in a black suit, paired with a white dress shirt.

However, his wife Anna was sure to upstage her husband, with her leggy display.

Anna wowed in the leopard print mini dress, which featured a black trim that reached her thighs.

She wore black pumps and styled her long brunette tresses in a beach wave.

Read More: Fans left to guess Hollywood stars as they look unrecognisable for new FX show

Striking an array of poses, the Sense And Sensibility star never left his wife's side during all the excitement of the red carpet.

Hugh has the role of the Oompa-Loompa in the much-anticipated movie, which will tell the original story of a young Wonka.

The film is based on the character in the 1964 novel Charlie And The Chocolate Factory by Roald Dahl.

Hugh and Anna share three children together and wed in 2018 at the Chelsea register office near their Â£10million West London home.

Grant also shares two children with actress Tinglan Hong.

In 2020, Hugh recalled missing his kids while working on HBO's The Undoing, which was shot in New York City over five months.

He said during an interview with Marie Claire, speaking to Nicole Kidman: "You had your family with you, which was, I think, very sensible.

"I thought, 'Oh, fantastic opportunity to get away from my screaming children.'

"I left everyone in London. And then as soon as I got to New York each time I came out to film, I missed so much. It was awful."

Wonka was released in UK cinemas on December 8
